{"blocks":[{"key":"8kc","text":"For hemi brains or whole brains add   of chilled lysis buffer for every   of brain tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"2E4EF543019F11EF8FA90A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"2E4EF4C5019F11EF8FA90A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b63kd","text":"Allow samples to thaw in chilled lysis buffer for about 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c3ici","text":"Check samples with a clean pipette tip. If tissue has thawed, move onto the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6661u","text":"Place samples on ice and add appropriate amounts of lysis buffer based on sample mass","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ds07b","text":"Use a tissue homogenizer to lyse the tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kcmr","text":"10 seconds homogenization at maximum speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c3gks","text":"tissue should be kept on ice during and after homogenization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
